about_the_game: Adventures of Helio is an upcoming old school-style 2D platformer that will test your skills in the genre! In this Latin American-inspired game, you play as the young dragon, Helio, as he must battle and trek his way home before the sinister thief, El Ladron, does and steal his treasure! Play through 60 levels, in six worlds, and overcome various challenges and foes, including many insane bosses and creatures, in order to reach Helio's home and protect his treasure!
detailed_description: Adventures of Helio is an upcoming old school-style 2D platformer that will test your skills in the genre! Play through 60 levels, in six worlds, and overcome various challenges and foes, including many insane bosses and creatures, in order to reach Helio's home and protect his treasure!
name: Adventures of Helio Demo
